com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot

Class UnidentifiedItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.Loot
      • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.UnidentifiedItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class UnidentifiedItem
extends Loot
    An UnidentifiedItem is an ItemStack generated by the plugin MythicDrops
    Author:
    Codisimus

      • UnidentifiedItem

                int amountLower,
                int amountUpper,
                int durabilityLower,
                int durabilityUpper)
        Constructs a new Loot with the given tier and amount/durability ranges
        Parameters:
        tierName - The name of the MythicDrops Tier
        amountLower - The lower bound of the amount range
        amountUpper - The upper bound of the amount range
        durabilityLower - The lower bound of the durability range
        durabilityUpper - The upper bound of the durability range

        Specified by:
        modifyAmount in class Loot
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to modify by (may be negative)
